optionalfeature.name: Absorption
entries: When you cast a spell that deals damage to the named target, you gain {@dice 3d6} temporary hit points. The number of temporary hit points you gain increases by {@dice 1d6} when you reach 10th level ({@dice 4d6}) and 14th level ({@dice 5d6}) in this class.

optionalfeature.name: 痛苦衝擊
entries: 當你施放{@spell 魔能爆}，在命中時將你的魅力調整值加入它所造成的傷害。

optionalfeature.name: Alchemical Acid
entries: As an action, you can reach into your Alchemist's Satchel, pull out a vial of acid, and hurl the vial at a creature or object within 30 feet of you (the vial and its contents disappear if you don't hurl the vial by the end of the current turn). The vial shatters on impact. A creature must succeed on a Dexterity saving throw or take {@damage 1d6} acid damage. An object automatically takes that damage, and the damage is maximized. This formula's damage increases by {@damage 1d6} when you reach certain levels in this class: 3rd level ({@damage 2d6}), 5th level ({@damage 3d6}), 7th level ({@damage 4d6}), 9th level ({@damage 5d6}), 11th level ({@damage 6d6}), 13th level ({@damage 7d6}), 15th level ({@damage 8d6}), 17th level ({@damage 9d6}), and 19th level ({@damage 10d6}).

optionalfeature.name: Alchemical Fire
entries: As an action, you can reach into your Alchemist's Satchel, pull out a vial of volatile liquid, and hurl the vial at a creature, object, or surface within 30 feet of you (the vial and its contents disappear if you don't hurl the vial by the end of the current turn). On impact, the vial detonates in a 5-foot radius. Any creature in that area must succeed on a Dexterity saving throw or take {@damage 1d6} fire damage. This formula's damage increases by {@damage 1d6} when you reach certain levels in this class: 4th level ({@damage 2d6}), 7th level ({@damage 3d6}), 10th level ({@damage 4d6}), 13th level ({@damage 5d6}), 16th level ({@damage 6d6}), and 19th level ({@damage 7d6}).

optionalfeature.name: Ambush
entries: When you make a Dexterity ({@skill Stealth}) check or an initiative roll, you can expend one superiority die and add the die to the roll, provided you aren't {@condition incapacitated}.

optionalfeature.name: Ambush
entries: When you make a Dexterity ({@skill Stealth}) check or an initiative roll, you can expend one superiority die and add the die to the roll.

optionalfeature.name: Arcane Gunslinger
entries: You can create a pact weapon that is a sidearm or long arm, and you can transform a magical sidearm or long arm into your pact weapon.

optionalfeature.name: Arcane Propulsion Armor
entries: The wearer of this armor gains these benefits:

items: The wearer's walking speed increases by 5 feet.

The armor includes gauntlets, each of which is a magic melee weapon that can be wielded only when the hand is holding nothing. The wearer is proficient with the gauntlets, and each one deals 1d8 force damage on a hit and has the thrown property, with a normal range of 20 feet and a long range of 60 feet. When thrown, the gauntlet detaches and flies at the attack's target, then immediately returns to the wearer and reattaches.
The armor can't be removed against the wearer's will.
If the wearer is missing any limbs, the armor replaces those limbs—hands, arms, feet, legs, or similar appendages. The replacements function identically to the body parts they replace.

optionalfeature.name: 弓道
entries: 你在使用遠程武器進行的攻擊檢定中獲得+2加值。

optionalfeature.name: Armor of Magical Strength
entries: This armor has 6 charges. The wearer can expend the armor's charges in the following ways:

items: When the wearer makes a Strength check or a Strength saving throw, it can expend 1 charge to add a bonus to the roll equal to its Intelligence modifier.
If the creature would be knocked {@condition prone}, it can use its reaction to expend 1 charge to avoid being knocked prone.

entries: The armor regains {@dice 1d6} expended charges daily at dawn.

optionalfeature.name: Armor of Magical Strength
entries: While wearing this armor, a creature can use its Intelligence modifier in place of its Strength modifier when making Strength checks and Strength saving throws.

The armor has 4 charges. As a reaction when it would be knocked {@condition prone}, the wearer can expend 1 charge to not be knocked {@condition prone}. The armor regains {@dice 1d4} expended charges daily at dawn.

optionalfeature.name: 暗影護甲
entries: 你可以對你自己隨意施放{@spell 法師護甲}，無需消耗法術位或材料構材。

optionalfeature.name: Armor of Tools
entries: As an action, a creature wearing this infused armor can integrate into it {@filter artisan's tools|items|source=phb|miscellaneous=mundane|type=artisan's tools} or {@item thieves' tools|phb}. The tools remain integrated in the armor for 8 hours or until the wearer removes the tools as an action. The armor can have only one tool integrated at a time.
The wearer can add its Intelligence modifier to any ability checks it makes with the integrated tool. The wearer must have a hand free to use the tool.

optionalfeature.name: 躍升步伐
entries: 你可以對你自己隨意施放{@spell 浮空術}，無需消耗法術位或材料構材。

optionalfeature.name: 月之儀態
entries: 你不再需要睡眠，且無法被任何方式強迫入睡。若要獲得長休的好處，你可以消耗完整8小時進行輕省活動，像是閱讀你的影之書和放哨。

optionalfeature.name: 月之儀態
entries: 你獲得了月亮女神的眷顧。你不再需要睡眠，且無法被任何方式強迫入睡。若要獲得長休的好處，你可以消耗完整8小時進行輕省活動，像是閱讀你的影之書和放哨。

optionalfeature.name: 月之儀態
entries: 你不再需要睡眠，且無法被任何方式強迫入睡。若要獲得長休的好處，你必須消耗完整8小時進行輕省活動，像是閱讀你的影之書和放哨。

optionalfeature.name: Bait and Switch
entries: When you're within 5 feet of a creature on your turn, you can expend one superiority die and switch places with that creature, provided you spend at least 5 feet of movement and the creature is willing and isn't {@condition incapacitated}. This movement doesn't provoke opportunity attacks.
Roll the superiority die. Until the start of your next turn, you or the other creature (your choice) gains a bonus to AC equal to the number rolled.

optionalfeature.name: Bait and Switch
entries: When you're within 5 feet of an ally on your turn, you can expend one superiority die and switch places with that ally, provided you spend at least 5 feet of movement. This movement doesn't provoke opportunity attacks.
Roll the superiority die. Until the start of your next turn, the ally gains a bonus to AC equal to the number rolled.

optionalfeature.name: Banishing Arrow
entries: You use abjuration magic to try to temporarily banish your target to a harmless location in the Feywild. If the arrow hits a creature, the target must also succeed on a Charisma saving throw or be banished. While banished in this way, its speed is 0, and it is {@condition incapacitated}. At the end of its next turn, the target reappears in the space it vacated or in the nearest unoccupied space if that space is occupied.
After you reach 18th level in this class, a target also takes {@damage 2d6} force damage when the arrow hits it.

optionalfeature.name: 放逐箭
entries: 你使用防護系魔法以嘗試暫時地將你的目標放逐到一個位於妖精荒野的無害區域。被此箭命中的生物必須成功通過一次魅力豁免，否則將被放逐。當因為這個方式被放逐，目標的移動速度將歸零，且陷入{@condition 無力}狀態。在它的下個回合結束時，目標將重新出現在它離開時所在的空間，或若該空間已被佔據則出現在最近一處未被佔據空間。
在你本職業升至18級之後，當被此箭命中時，目標同時也將受到{@dice 2d6}力場傷害。

optionalfeature.name: 野獸之語
entries: 你可以隨意施放{@spell 動物交談術}，無需消耗法術位。

optionalfeature.name: Beguiling Arrow
entries: Your enchantment magic causes this arrow to temporarily beguile its target. Choose one of your allies within 30 feet of the target. If the arrow hits the target, the target can't attack the chosen ally or include that ally in a harmful area of effect until the end of your next turn. The target ignores this effect if it is immune to the {@condition charmed} condition. This effect also ends if the chosen ally deals any damage to the target.

optionalfeature.name: 迷惑箭
entries: 你的惑控系魔法讓這支箭能暫時地迷惑它的目標。被此箭命中的生物將受到額外的{@dice 2d6}精神傷害，且你選擇其中一個距離目標30呎內的你的盟友。目標必須成功通過一次睿知豁免，否則被所選的目標{@condition 魅惑}直到你的下個回合開始。這個效果會在所選的盟友攻擊被{@condition 魅惑}目標、對目標造成傷害、或強迫它進行豁免檢定時提早結束。
這個精神傷害將在你本職業升至18級時增加至{@dice 4d6}。

optionalfeature.name: 迷人影響力
entries: 你獲得對{@skill 欺瞞}和{@skill 說服}的技能熟練。

optionalfeature.name: 惑人低語
entries: 你可以使用契術師法術位施放一次{@spell 強迫術}。直到你完成一次長休之前你都不能再這麼做。

optionalfeature.name: Blessed Warrior
entries: You learn two cantrips of your choice from the {@filter cleric spell list|spells|level=0|class=Cleric}. They count as paladin spells for you, and Charisma is your spellcasting ability for them. Whenever you gain a level in this class, you can replace one of these cantrips with another cantrip from the cleric spell list.

optionalfeature.name: Blessed Warrior
entries: You learn two cantrips of your choice from the {@filter cleric spell list|spells|level=0|class=Cleric}. They count as paladin spells for you, and Charisma is your spellcasting ability for them. Whenever you gain a level in this class, you can replace one of these cantrips with another cantrip from the cleric spell list.

optionalfeature.name: Blind Fighting
entries: You have {@sense blindsight} with a range of 10 feet. Within that range, you can effectively see anything that isn't behind total cover, even if you're {@condition blinded} or in darkness. Moreover, you can see an {@condition invisible} creature within that range, unless the creature successfully hides from you.

optionalfeature.name: Blind Fighting
entries: Being unable to see a creature doesn't impose disadvantage on your attack rolls against it, provided the creature isn't hidden from you.

optionalfeature.name: Bond of the Talisman
entries: While someone else is wearing your talisman, you can use your action to teleport to the unoccupied space closest to them, provided the two of you are on the same plane of existence. The wearer of your talisman can do the same thing, using their action to teleport to you. The teleportation can be used a number of times equal to your proficiency bonus, and all expended uses are restored when you finish a long rest.

optionalfeature.name: Bond of the Talisman
entries: While someone else is wearing your talisman, you can use your action to teleport to the unoccupied space closest to them, provided the two of you are on the same plane of existence. The wearer of your talisman can do the same thing, using their action to teleport to you.

optionalfeature.name: 遠古奧秘卷冊
entries: 現在你可以將魔法儀式抄寫進你的影之書。選擇二個{@filter 任何職業法術列表中具有儀式標籤的1環法術|spells|tag=ritual|level=1}。這些法術並不需要是來自同一個法術列表。這些法術將出現在書中，且不會計入你的已知法術數量。當影之書在你手上時，你能夠以儀式施展所選的法術。你不能以儀式以外的方式施展這些法術，除非你透過其他方式習得了它們。若一個你已知的契術師法術具有儀式標籤，你也可以將它作為儀式施展。
在你的冒險中，你可以將其他儀式法術加入你的影之書。當你找到一個這樣的法術時，若該法術的環階等於或低於你契術師等級的一半（小數點進位）且你能夠騰出時間抄寫該法術，你就可以將它加到書中。抄寫該法術的過程需要花費每環階2小時的時間，和成本為每環階50金幣用於抄寫的稀有墨水。

optionalfeature.name: Boots of the Winding Path
entries: While wearing these boots, a creature can teleport up to 15 feet as a bonus action to an unoccupied space the creature can see. The creature must have occupied that space at some point during the current turn.

optionalfeature.name: 曲徑折返之靴
entries: 當穿著這雙靴子時，該生物能夠以一個附贈動作傳送到最多15呎距離的一處該生物所能看見的未被佔據空間。該生物必須必須在該回合期間曾經佔據過該空間。

optionalfeature.name: Brace
entries: When a creature you can see moves into the reach you have with the melee weapon you're wielding, you can use your reaction to expend one superiority die and make one attack against the creature, using that weapon. If the attack hits, add the superiority die to the weapon's damage roll.

optionalfeature.name: Brace
entries: When an enemy you can see moves within 5 feet of you, you can use your reaction to expend one superiority die and make one weapon attack against that creature. If the attack hits, add the superiority die to the attack's damage roll.

optionalfeature.name: 寒冬之息
entries: 你可以消耗6點氣以施放{@spell 寒冰錐}。

optionalfeature.name: Brute Bane Arrow
entries: You weave necromantic magic into your arrow. If a creature is hit by the arrow, any bludgeoning, piercing, or slashing damage dealt by the creature's attacks is halved until the end of your next turn.

optionalfeature.name: Brute Bane Arrow
entries: You weave necromantic magic into your arrow. If your arrow hits a creature, the target takes an extra {@damage 2d6} necrotic damage and must make a Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, the damage of the target's attacks is halved until the next turn.
The necrotic damage increases to {@damage 4d6} when you reach 18th level with this class.

optionalfeature.name: 燃燒巫咒
entries: 以一個附贈動作，你使一個被你咒劍詛咒給影響的目標受到等同於你魅力調整值的火燄傷害（最少為1）。

optionalfeature.name: Bursting Arrow
entries: You imbue your arrow with a blast of force energy drawn from the school of evocation. If you hit a creature with this arrow, each creature within 10 feet of it takes {@damage 2d6} force damage.

optionalfeature.name: Bursting Arrow
entries: You imbue your arrow with a blast of force energy drawn from the school of evocation. If the arrow hits a creature, the target and each creature within 10 feet of it takes {@damage 2d6} force damage.
The force damage increases to {@damage 4d6} when you reach 18th level with this class.

optionalfeature.name: 爆裂箭
entries: 你將汲取自塑能學派的力場能量註入你的箭矢。這股能量將在你攻擊之後爆發。緊接在此箭命中一個生物之後，目標和所有距離它10呎內的其他生物都將各自受到{@dice 2d6}力場傷害。
這個力場傷害將在你本職業升至18級時增加至{@dice 4d6}。

optionalfeature.name: Caiphon's Beacon
entries: The purple star Caiphon is the doom of inexperienced mariners. Those who use its deceptive light to guide their travels invariably come to ruin. You gain proficiency in the {@skill Deception} and {@skill Stealth} skills, and you have advantage on attack rolls against {@condition charmed} creatures.

optionalfeature.name: 謹慎法術
entries: 當你施放一個會強迫其他生物進行豁免檢定的法術時，你可以保護其中一些生物不受該法術的完整威力影響。要這麼做，你得消耗1點術法點，並選擇最多等同於你魅力調整值數量的生物（最少一個生物）。被選擇的生物將在對抗該法術的豁免檢定中自動成功。

optionalfeature.name: Chain Master's Fury
entries: As a bonus action, you can command your familiar to make one attack.

optionalfeature.name: 卡瑟利之縛
entries: 你可以隨意施放{@spell 怪物定身術}—以一個天界生物、邪魔、或元素為目標—而無需消耗法術位或材料構材。你必須完成一次長休才能再對同一個生物使用此祈喚。

optionalfeature.name: Chilling Hex
entries: As a bonus action, you cause frost to swirl around a target cursed by your Hexblade's Curse, dealing cold damage to each of your enemies within 5 feet of the target. The cold damage equals your Charisma modifier (minimum of 1).

optionalfeature.name: Chronicle of the Raven Queen
entries: You can place a corpse's hand or similar appendage on your Book of Shadows and ask one question aloud. After 1 minute, the answer appears written in blood in your book. The answer is provided by the dead creature's spirit to the best of its knowledge and is translated into a language of your choice. You must use this ability within 1 minute of a creature's death, and a given creature can only be asked one question in this manner.

optionalfeature.name: Claw of Acamar
entries: You can create a black, lead flail using your Pact of the Blade feature. The flail's head is sculpted to resemble a pair of grasping tentacles. The weapon has the reach property. When you hit a creature with it, you can expend a spell slot to deal an additional {@damage 2d8} necrotic damage to the target per spell level, and you can reduce the creature's speed to 0 feet until the end of your next turn.

optionalfeature.name: 北風之握
entries: 你可以消耗3點氣以施放{@spell 人類定身術}。

optionalfeature.name: Cloak of Baalzebul
entries: As a bonus action, you can conjure a swarm of buzzing flies around you. The swarm grants you advantage on Charisma ({@skill Intimidation}) checks but disadvantage on all other Charisma checks. In addition, a creature that starts its turn within 5 feet of you takes poison damage equal to your Charisma modifier. You can dismiss the swarm with another bonus action.

optionalfeature.name: Cloak of Flies
entries: As a bonus action, you can surround yourself with a magical aura that looks like buzzing flies. The aura includes your space, extends 5 feet from you in every direction, and is blocked by total cover. It lasts until you're {@condition incapacitated} or you dismiss it with a bonus action.

The aura grants you advantage on Charisma ({@skill Intimidation}) checks but disadvantage on all other Charisma checks. Any other creature that starts its turn in the aura takes poison damage equal to your Charisma modifier (minimum of 0 damage).
Once you use this invocation, you can't use it again until you finish a short or long rest.

optionalfeature.name: 飛蠅鬥篷
entries: 以一個附贈動作，你可以讓一道彷彿嗡嗡飛蠅的魔法靈光環繞在你周圍。這道靈光從你向四周延伸5呎，但不會穿過全掩護。它會持續存在直到你陷入{@condition 無力}狀態或你以一個附贈動作解消它。
這道靈光將讓你在魅力（{@skill 威嚇}）檢定中獲得優勢，但在其他所有魅力檢定中承受劣勢。任何其他在這道靈光中開始它回合的生物將受到等同於你魅力調整值的毒素傷害（最少為0）。
一旦你使用此祈喚，直到你完成一次短休或長休之前都無法再使用它。

optionalfeature.name: 近身射手
entries: 當你在距離一個敵意生物5呎以內時進行一次遠程攻擊，你在該攻擊檢定中並不會具有劣勢。你的遠程攻擊忽略距離你30呎內目標的半掩護和四分之三掩護。你在遠程攻擊的攻擊檢定中獲得+1加值。

optionalfeature.name: Cloud Rune
entries: This rune emulates the deceptive magic used by some cloud giants. While wearing or carrying an object inscribed with this rune, you have advantage on Dexterity ({@skill Sleight of Hand}) checks and Charisma ({@skill Deception}) checks.

In addition, when you or a creature you can see within 30 feet of you is hit by an attack roll, you can use your reaction to invoke the rune and choose a different creature within 30 feet of you, other than the attacker. The chosen creature becomes the target of the attack, using the same roll. This magic can transfer the attack's effects regardless of the attack's range. Once you invoke this rune, you can't do so again until you finish a short or long rest.

optionalfeature.name: 指揮官奇襲
entries: 當你在你的回合採取{@action 攻擊}動作時，你可以放棄你的其中一次攻擊，並使用一個附贈動作以指揮你的其中一個同伴進行奇襲。當你這麼做時，選擇一個能夠看見或聽見你的友善生物，並消耗一顆卓越骰。該生物可以立刻使用它的反應以進行一次武器攻擊，並將卓越骰加入該攻擊的傷害骰中。

optionalfeature.name: Commanding Presence
entries: When you make a Charisma ({@skill Intimidation}), a Charisma ({@skill Performance}), or a Charisma ({@skill Persuasion}) check, you can expend one superiority die and add the superiority die to the ability check.

optionalfeature.name: Control Mount
entries: When you make a Wisdom ({@skill Animal Handling}) check to influence a creature that you or an ally is riding, you can expend one superiority die, roll it, and add the number rolled to the check. You can do this before or after rolling the {@dice d20}, but before applying the results of the check.

optionalfeature.name: Curse Bringer
entries: You can create a greatsword forged from silver, with black runes etched into its blade, using your Pact of the Blade feature. If you reduce a target cursed by your Hexblade's Curse to 0 hit points with this sword, you can immediately change the target of the curse to a different creature. This change doesn't extend the curse's duration.

When you hit a creature with this weapon, you can expend a spell slot to deal an additional {@damage 2d8} slashing damage to the target per spell level, and you can reduce the creature's speed to 0 feet until the end of your next turn.

optionalfeature.name: Defending Arrow
entries: You use abjuration magic to weave a charm that disrupts your enemy's magic. A creature hit by this arrow suffers disadvantage on the next attack roll it makes before the end of your next turn.

optionalfeature.name: 防禦
entries: 當你穿戴護甲時，你的AC獲得+1加值。

optionalfeature.name: Devastation
entries: If the spell requires the named creature to make a saving throw, that creature has disadvantage on the first save it makes against the spell.

optionalfeature.name: 魔鬼視覺
entries: 當你在黑暗中，無論是魔法還是非魔法黑暗，你可以正常看見距離你120呎範圍內的事物。

optionalfeature.name: 繳械擊
entries: 當你以一次武器攻擊命中一個生物時，你可以消耗一顆卓越骰並嘗試使目標繳械，強迫它掉落一個它正持握且你所選擇的物品。你將卓越骰加入該攻擊的傷害骰中，且目標必須進行一次力量豁免。若豁免失敗，它將掉落你所選擇的該物體。該物體將落在它的腳邊。

optionalfeature.name: Dissolution
entries: The first time the named creature takes damage from the spell, that creature takes an extra {@damage 2d8} force damage. The extra force damage increases by {@damage 1d8} when you reach 10th level ({@damage 3d8}) and 14th level ({@damage 4d8}) in this class.

optionalfeature.name: 遠程法術
entries: 當你施放一個射程為5呎或更遠的法術時，你可以消耗1點術法點以將該法術的射程變為二倍。
當你施放一個射程為觸碰的法術時，你可以消耗1點術法點以將該法術的射程變為30呎。

optionalfeature.name: 擾亂擊
entries: 當你以一次武器攻擊命中一個生物時，你可以消耗一顆卓越骰以幹擾該生物，為你的盟友製造良機。你將卓越骰加入該攻擊的傷害骰中。在你的下個回合開始前，下一次你以外的攻擊者對目標所進行的攻擊檢定將具有優勢。

optionalfeature.name: 恐懼之語
entries: 你可以使用契術師法術位施放一次{@spell 困惑術}。直到你完成一次長休之前你都不能再這麼做。

optionalfeature.name: Druidic Warrior
entries: You learn two cantrips of your choice from the {@filter druid spell list|spells|level=0|class=druid}. They count as ranger spells for you, and Wisdom is your spellcasting ability for them. Whenever you gain a level in this class, you can replace one of these cantrips with another cantrip from the druid spell list.

optionalfeature.name: Druidic Warrior
entries: You learn two cantrips of your choice from the {@filter druid spell list|spells|level=0|class=druid}. They count as druid spells for you, and Wisdom is your spellcasting ability for them. Whenever you gain a level in this class, you can replace one of these cantrips with another cantrip from the druid spell list.

optionalfeature.name: 決鬥
entries: 當你單手持用一把近戰武器，且沒有持用其他武器時，你在使用該武器所進行的傷害骰中獲得+2加值。

optionalfeature.name: Eldritch Armor
entries: As an action, you can touch a suit of armor that isn't being worn or carried by anyone and instantly don it, provided you aren't wearing armor already. You are proficient with this suit of armor until it's removed.

optionalfeature.name: Eldritch Mind
entries: You have advantage on Constitution saving throws that you make to maintain your concentration on a spell.

optionalfeature.name: Eldritch Mind
entries: You have advantage on Constitution saving throws that you make to maintain your concentration on a spell.

optionalfeature.name: 魔能視界
entries: 你可以隨意施放{@spell 偵測魔法}，無需消耗法術位。

optionalfeature.name: 魔能重斬
entries: 每回合一次，當你使用你的契約武器命中一個生物時，你可以消耗一個契術師法術位以對目標造成額外的{@dice 1d8}力場傷害，加上該法術位每環階再{@dice 1d8}點的傷害。若目標受到此傷害且它的體型為巨型或更小，你可以將目標擊倒{@condition 伏地}。

optionalfeature.name: 魔能重斬
entries: 每回合一次，當你使用你的契約武器命中一個生物時，你可以消耗一個契術師法術位以對目標造成額外的{@dice 1d8}力場傷害，加上該法術位每環階再{@dice 1d8}點的傷害，且若目標的體型為巨型或更小，你可以將目標擊倒{@condition 伏地}。

optionalfeature.name: 魔能之矛
entries: 當你施放{@spell 魔能爆}，它的射程變為300呎。

optionalfeature.name: 元素調律
entries: 你可以使用你的動作以簡單地控制距離你30呎內的元素之力，造成下列其中一個你所選擇的效果：

items: 創造出一個與氣、土、火、或水有關，即效而無害的感官效果，像是火花飛濺、清風吹拂、輕煙飄散、或岩石輕微地隆隆作響。
立刻點亮或熄滅一根蠟燭、火炬、或一處小型篝火。
冷卻或溫熱最多1磅的非活物物質長達最多1小時。
使一片可容納於1呎邊長立方體內的土、火、水、或霧以自我形塑成你指定的粗糙形狀，長達1分鐘。

optionalfeature.name: Elemental Spell
entries: When you cast a spell that deals a type of damage from the following list, you can spend 1 sorcery point to change that damage type to one of the other listed types: acid, cold, fire, lightning, thunder.

optionalfeature.name: 強效法術
entries: 當你在為法術骰傷害時，你可以消耗1點術法點以重骰最多等同於你魅力調整值數量的骰子（最少一顆）。你必須使用新的擲骰結果。
即使你已經在施放此法術的期間已經使用了一個不同的超魔法選項，你仍然可以使用強效法術。

optionalfeature.name: 衰弱箭
entries: 你將死靈系魔法編入你的箭矢中。被此箭命中的生物將受到額外的{@dice 2d6}死靈傷害。目標也必須成功通過一次體質豁免，否則它武器攻擊所造成的傷害將被減半，持續直到你的下個回合開始。
這個死靈傷害將在你本職業升至18級時增加至{@dice 4d6}。

optionalfeature.name: Enhanced Arcane Focus

item: A rod, staff, or wand (requires attunement)

entries: While holding this item, a creature gains a +1 bonus to spell attack rolls. In addition, the creature ignores half cover when making a spell attack.
The bonus increases to +2 when you reach 10th level in this class.

optionalfeature.name: Enhanced Defense

item: A suit of armor or a shield

entries: A creature gains a +1 bonus to Armor Class while wearing (armor) or wielding (shield) the infused item.
The bonus increases to +2 when you reach 10th level in this class.

optionalfeature.name: 增強防禦

item: A suit of armor or a shield

entries: 一個生物在穿戴（護甲）或持用（盾牌）註法物品時將在它的護甲等級上額外獲得+1加值。
這個加值將在你於本職業升至12級時增加至+2。

optionalfeature.name: Enhanced Wand
entries: While holding this wand, a creature gains a +1 bonus to spell attack rolls. In addition, the creature ignores half cover when making a spell attack.
The bonus increases to +2 when you reach 12th level in this class.

optionalfeature.name: Enhanced Weapon
entries: This magic weapon grants a +1 bonus to attack and damage rolls made with it.
The bonus increases to +2 when you reach 10th level in this class.

optionalfeature.name: 增強武器
entries: 這把魔法武器將在使用它進行的攻擊檢定和傷害骰上賦予+1加值。
這個加值將在你於本職業升至12級時增加至+2。

optionalfeature.name: 蒼山庇佑
entries: 你可以消耗5點氣以施放{@spell 石膚術}，以你自己為目標。

optionalfeature.name: 躲閃步伐
entries: 當你移動時，你可以消耗一顆卓越骰，擲該卓越骰並將骰出的數字加入你的AC中直到你停止移動。

optionalfeature.name: 延時法術
entries: 當你施放一個持續時間為1分鐘或更久的法術時，你可以消耗1點術法點以將它的持續時間變為二倍，最久到24小時。

optionalfeature.name: 符文師之眼
entries: 你可以讀懂所有文字。

optionalfeature.name: 火蛇利牙
entries: 當你在你的回合使用{@action 攻擊}動作時，你可以消耗1點氣以讓烈燄觸手從你的拳腳延伸而出。你徒手打擊的觸及範圍在該動作以及該回合結束前視為增加10呎。這類攻擊在命中時將造成火燄傷害，而非鈍擊傷害。且若你在攻擊命中時消耗1點氣，它將造成額外的{@dice 1d10}火燄傷害。

optionalfeature.name: Far Scribe
entries: A new page appears in your Book of Shadows. With your permission, a creature can use its action to write its name on that page, which can contain a number of names equal to your proficiency bonus.

You can cast the {@spell 短訊術} spell, targeting a creature whose name is on the page, without using a spell slot and without using material components. To do so, you must write the message on the page. The target hears the message in their mind, and if the target replies, their message appears on the page, rather than in your mind. The writing disappears after 1 minute.
As an action, you can magically erase a name on the page by touching it.

optionalfeature.name: Far Scribe
entries: A new page appears in your Book of Shadows. With your permission, a creature can use its action to write its name on that page, which can contain a number of names equal to your Charisma modifier (minimum of 1).

You can cast the {@spell 短訊術} spell, targeting a creature whose name is on the page, without using a spell slot and without using material components. To do so, you must write the message on the page. The target hears the message in their mind, and if the target replies, their message appears on the page, rather than in your mind. The writing disappears after 1 minute.
As an action, you can magically erase a name on the page by touching the name on it.

optionalfeature.name: 詭詐擊
entries: 你可以消耗一顆卓越骰並在你的回合使用一個附贈動作以進行佯攻，選擇一個距離你5呎內的生物做為你的目標。你在該回合對該生物的下一次攻擊檢定中具有優勢。若該攻擊命中，則將卓越骰加入該攻擊的傷害骰中。
若你在獲得這個優勢的回合中沒有使用它，則你將會失去這個優勢。

optionalfeature.name: 邪魔精力
entries: 你可以對你自己以1環法術隨意施放{@spell 摹造生命}，無需消耗法術位或材料構材。

optionalfeature.name: Fire Rune
entries: This rune's magic channels the masterful craftsmanship of great smiths. While wearing or carrying an object inscribed with this rune, your proficiency bonus is doubled for any ability check you make that uses your proficiency with a tool.

In addition, when you hit a creature with an attack using a weapon, you can invoke the rune to summon fiery shackles: the target takes an extra {@damage 2d6} fire damage, and it must succeed on a Strength saving throw or be {@condition restrained} for 1 minute. While {@condition restrained} by the shackles, the target takes {@damage 2d6} fire damage at the start of each of its turns. The target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, banishing the shackles on a success. Once you invoke this rune, you can't do so again until you finish a short or long rest.

optionalfeature.name: 四雷拳
entries: 你可以消耗2點氣以施放{@spell 雷鳴波}。

optionalfeature.name: 鳳凰火
entries: 你可以消耗4點氣以施放{@spell 火球術}。

optionalfeature.name: Frost Lance
entries: Once on each of your turns when you hit a creature with your {@spell 魔能爆}, you can reduce that creature's speed by 10 feet until the end of your next turn.

optionalfeature.name: Frost Lance
entries: You draw on the gifts of the Prince of Frost to trap your enemies in ice. When you hit a creature with your {@spell 魔能爆} cantrip one or more times on your turn, you can reduce that creature's speed by 10 feet until the end of your next turn.

optionalfeature.name: Frost Rune
entries: This rune's magic evokes the might of those who survive in the wintry wilderness, such as frost giants. While wearing or carrying an object inscribed with this rune, you have advantage on Wisdom ({@skill Animal Handling}) checks and Charisma ({@skill Intimidation}) checks.

In addition, you can invoke the rune as a bonus action to increase your sturdiness. For 10 minutes, you gain a +2 bonus to all ability checks and saving throws that use Strength or Constitution. Once you invoke this rune, you can't do so again until you finish a short or long rest.

optionalfeature.name: Gaze of Khirad
entries: You gain the piercing gaze of the blue star Khirad. As an action, you can see through solid objects to a range of 30 feet until the end of the current turn. During that time, you perceive objects as ghostly, transparent images.

optionalfeature.name: 聯心之視
entries: 你可以使用你的動作以觸碰一個自願的類人生物，並直到你的下個回合結束前透過它的感官感知周遭。只要該生物和你處於相同的存在位面，你就可以在後續的回合中使用你的動作以維持這道連結，將持續時間延長到你的下個回合結束。當透過該生物的感官感知時，你得益於該生物所擁有的任何特殊感官，且你對你自己的周遭環境視作{@condition 耳聾}和{@condition 目盲}。

optionalfeature.name: 幽魂凝視
entries: 以一個動作，你獲得看透30呎範圍內固態物體的能力。若你尚未具有黑暗視覺，則你將在此範圍內具有黑暗視覺。這個特殊感官將持續直到該回合結束。在這段期間，你所看到的物體將呈現幽影般、透明的影像。一旦你使用此祈喚，直到你完成一次短休或長休之前都無法再使用它。

optionalfeature.name: 幽魂凝視
entries: 以一個動作，你獲得看透30呎範圍內固態物體的能力。若你尚未具有黑暗視覺，則你將在此範圍內具有黑暗視覺。這個特殊感官將持續1分鐘或直到你結束專註（如同你專註於法術）。在這段期間，你所看到的物體將呈現幽影般、透明的影像。
一旦你使用此祈喚，直到你完成一次短休或長休之前都無法再使用它。

optionalfeature.name: 深海之賜
entries: 你可以在水下呼吸，且你獲得等同於你步行速度的游泳速度。你也可以施放{@spell 水下呼吸}一次而無需消耗法術位。一旦你使用此祈喚施放它，直到你完成一次長休之前你都不能再這麼做。

optionalfeature.name: 深海之賜
entries: 你可以在水下呼吸，且你獲得等同於你步行速度的游泳速度。
你也可以施放{@spell 水下呼吸}一次而無需消耗法術位。你在完成一次長休後恢復這麼做的能力。

optionalfeature.name: 永生者之賜
entries: 每當你在你的魔寵距離你100呎內時回復生命值，將任何用以決定你生命值回復量的骰子都視作它們骰出了最大值。

optionalfeature.name: 永生者之賜
entries: 每當你在你的魔寵距離你100呎內時回復生命值，將任何用以決定你生命值回復量的骰子都視作它們骰出了最大值。

optionalfeature.name: Gift of the Protectors
entries: A new page appears in your Book of Shadows. With your permission, a creature can use its action to write its name on that page, which can contain a number of names equal to your proficiency bonus.

When any creature whose name is on the page is reduced to 0 hit points but not killed outright, the creature magically drops to 1 hit point instead. Once this magic is triggered, no creature can benefit from it until you finish a long rest.
As an action, you can magically erase a name on the page by touching it.

optionalfeature.name: Gift of the Protectors
entries: A new page appears in your Book of Shadows. With your permission, a creature can use its action to write its name on that page, which can contain a number of names equal to your Charisma modifier (minimum of 1).

When any creature whose name is on the page is reduced to 0 hit points but not killed outright, the creature magically drops to 1 hit point instead. Once this magic is triggered, no creature can benefit from it until you finish a long rest.
As an action, you can magically erase a name on the page by touching the name on it.

optionalfeature.name: 挑釁擊
entries: 當你以一次武器攻擊命中一個生物時，你可以消耗一顆卓越骰以嘗試挑釁目標攻擊你。你將卓越骰加入該攻擊的傷害骰中，且目標必須進行一次睿知豁免。若豁免失敗，則直到你的下個回合結束前，目標對你以外的對象所進行的所有攻擊檢定都將承受劣勢。

optionalfeature.name: 獅吼功
entries: 你可以消耗3點氣以施放{@spell 粉碎音波}。

optionalfeature.name: Grappling Strike
entries: Immediately after you hit a creature with a melee attack on your turn, you can expend one superiority die and then try to grapple the target as a bonus action (see the Player's Handbook for rules on grappling). Add the superiority die to your Strength ({@skill Athletics}) check.

optionalfeature.name: 哈達之攫
entries: 在你的每個回合一次，當你使用你的{@spell 魔能爆}戲法命中一個生物時，你可以讓該生物向你直線移動10呎。

optionalfeature.name: 哈達之攫
entries: 在你的回合期間一次，當你使用你的{@spell 魔能爆}戲法命中一個生物時，你可以讓該生物向你直線移動10呎。

optionalfeature.name: 哈達之攫
entries: 在你的每個回合一次，當你使用你的{@spell 魔能爆}命中一個生物時，你可以讓該生物向你直線移動10呎。

optionalfeature.name: Grasping Arrow
entries: When this arrow strikes its target, conjuration magic creates grasping, thorny brambles that wrap around the target. The target hit by the arrow takes a -10 penalty to speed, and it takes {@damage 2d6} slashing damage if it moves 1 foot or more without teleporting. The target or any creature that can touch it can use its action to try to remove the brambles, which requires a successful DC 10 Strength check. Otherwise, the brambles last for 1 minute.

optionalfeature.name: Grasping Arrow
entries: When this arrow strikes its target, conjuration magic creates grasping, thorny brambles that wrap around the target. If the arrow hits a creature, the target takes an extra {@damage 2d6} poison damage, its speed is reduced by 10 feet, and it takes {@damage 2d6} slashing damage the first time on each turn it moves 1 foot or more without teleporting. The target or any creature that can reach it can use its action to remove the brambles with a successful Strength ({@skill Athletics}) check against your Arcane Shot save DC. Otherwise, the brambles last for 1 minute or until you use this option again.
The poison and slashing damage both increase to {@damage 4d6} when you reach 18th level in this class.

optionalfeature.name: 糾纏箭
entries: 當此箭擊中它的目標，咒法系魔法將創造出一團糾纏著的有毒刺籐，緊緊纏繞著目標。被此箭命中的生物將受到額外的{@dice 2d6}毒素傷害，它的移動速度降低10呎，且它在每回合不透過傳送而第一次移動1呎或以上的距離時，將再受到{@dice 2d6}劈砍傷害。目標或其他能夠觸及它的生物可以使用它的動作，並藉由成功通過一次對抗你祕法射擊豁免DC的力量（{@skill 運動}）檢定以移除這些刺籐。否則，這些刺籐將持續存在長達1分鐘，或直到你再次使用這個選項。
這個毒素傷害和劈砍傷害將在你本職業升至18級時增加至{@dice 4d6}。

optionalfeature.name: 巨武戰鬥
entries: 當你在使用一把以雙手持用的近戰武器所進行攻擊的傷害骰中骰出了1或2的結果，你可以重骰該骰，且必須使用新的擲骰結果，即使其結果仍然是1或2。該武器必須具有雙手或可雙手屬性才能讓你獲得這個好處。

optionalfeature.name: Green Lord's Gift
entries: The Green Lord oversees a verdant realm of everlasting summer. Your soul is linked to his power. Whenever you regain hit points, you treat any dice rolled to determine the hit points you regain as having rolled their maximum value.

optionalfeature.name: Haug (Hill Rune)
entries: This rune's magic bestows a resilience reminiscent of a hill giant. While wearing or carrying an object inscribed with this rune, you have advantage on saving throws against being {@condition poisoned}, and you have resistance against poison damage.

In addition, you can invoke the rune as a bonus action, gaining resistance to bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing damage for 1 minute. Once you invoke the rune, you can't do so again until you finish a short or long rest.

optionalfeature.name: Healing Draught
entries: As an action, you can reach into your Alchemist's Satchel and pull out a vial of healing liquid. A creature can drink it as an action to regain {@dice 1d8} hit points. The vial then disappears. Once a creature regains hit points from this alchemical formula, the creature can't do so again until it finishes a long rest. If not used, the vial and its contents disappear after 1 hour. While the vial exists, you can't use this formula. This formula's healing increases by {@dice 1d8} when you reach certain levels in this class: 3rd level ({@dice 2d8}), 5th level ({@dice 3d8}), 7th level ({@dice 4d8}), 9th level ({@dice 5d8}), 11th level ({@dice 6d8}), 13th level ({@dice 7d8}), 15th level ({@dice 8d8}), 17th level ({@dice 9d8}), and 19th level ({@dice 10d8}).

optionalfeature.name: 升階法術
entries: 當你施放一個會強迫一個生物進行豁免檢定以抵抗它效果的法術時，你可以消耗3點術法點以讓一個該法術的目標在它對抗該法術的第一次豁免檢定中承受劣勢。

optionalfeature.name: Helm of Awareness
entries: While wearing this helmet, a creature has advantage on initiative rolls. In addition, the wearer can't be surprised, provided it isn't {@condition incapacitated}.

optionalfeature.name: Helm of Awareness
entries: While wearing this helmet, a creature has advantage on initiative rolls. In addition, the wearer can't be surprised, provided it isn't {@condition incapacitated}.

optionalfeature.name: Hill Rune
entries: This rune's magic bestows a resilience reminiscent of a hill giant. While wearing or carrying an object that bears this rune, you have advantage on saving throws against being {@condition poisoned}, and you have resistance against poison damage.

In addition, you can invoke the rune as a bonus action, gaining resistance to bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing damage for 1 minute. Once you invoke this rune, you can't do so again until you finish a short or long rest.

optionalfeature.name: Homunculus Servant

item: A gem or crystal worth at least 100 gp

entries: You learn intricate methods for magically creating a special {@creature Homunculus Servant|TCE|homunculus} that serves you. The item you infuse serves as the creature's heart, around which the creature's body instantly forms.
You determine the homunculus's appearance. Some artificers prefer mechanical-looking birds, whereas some like winged vials or miniature, animate cauldrons.

The homunculus is friendly to you and your companions, and it obeys your commands. See this creature's game statistics in the Homunculus Servant stat block, which uses your proficiency bonus (PB) in several places.

In combat, the homunculus shares your initiative count, but it takes its turn immediately after yours. It can move and use its reaction on its own, but the only action it takes on its turn is the {@action Dodge} action, unless you take a bonus action on your turn to command it to take another action. That action can be one in its stat block or some other action. If you are {@condition incapacitated}, the homunculus can take any action of its choice, not just {@action Dodge}.

The homunculus regains {@dice 2d6} hit points if the {@spell 修復術} spell is cast on it. If it dies, it vanishes, leaving its heart in its space. If you or the homunculus dies, it vanishes, leaving its heart in its space.

optionalfeature.name: Ild (Fire Rune)
entries: This rune's magic channels the masterful craftsmanship of fire giant smiths. While wearing or carrying an object inscribed with this rune, your proficiency bonus is doubled for any ability check you make that uses your proficiency with a tool.

In addition, when you hit a creature with a weapon attack, you can invoke the rune to summon fiery shackles: the target must succeed on a Strength saving throw or be {@condition restrained} for 1 minute. While {@condition restrained} by the shackles, the target takes  {@damage 2d6} fire damage at the start of each of its turns. The target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, banishing the shackles on a success. Once you invoke the rune, you can't do so again until you finish a short or long rest.

optionalfeature.name: 進階契約武器
entries: 你可以使用任何你透過鋒刃魔契能力召喚出來的武器做為你施放契術師法術的法器。此外，該武器視作一把在攻擊檢定和傷害骰上具有+1加值的魔法武器，除非它已經是一把被你轉化為你契約武器的魔法武器。

optionalfeature.name: Improved Pact Weapon
entries: Any weapon you create using your Pact of the Blade feature is a +1 weapon. This invocation doesn't affect a magic weapon you transformed into your pact weapon.

optionalfeature.name: 進階契約武器
entries: 你可以使用任何你透過鋒刃魔契能力召喚出來的武器做為你施放契術師法術的法器。
此外，該武器在它的攻擊檢定和傷害骰上獲得+1加值，除非它已經是一把在這些擲骰中具有加值的魔法武器。
最後，你所召喚的該武器可以是一把{@item 短弓|phb}、{@item 長弓|phb}、{@item 輕弩|phb}、或{@item 重弩|phb}。

optionalfeature.name: Interception
entries: When a creature you can see hits a target, other than you, within 5 feet of you with an attack, you can use your reaction to reduce the damage the target takes by {@dice 1d10} + your proficiency bonus (to a minimum of 0 damage). You must be wielding a {@item shield|phb} or a simple or martial weapon to use this reaction.

optionalfeature.name: Interception
entries: When a creature you can see hits a target that is within 5 feet of you with an attack, you can use your reaction to reduce the damage the target takes by {@dice 1d10} + your proficiency bonus (to a minimum of 0 damage). You must be wielding a shield or a simple or martial weapon to use this reaction.

optionalfeature.name: Investment of the Chain Master
entries: When you cast {@spell 尋獲魔寵}, you infuse the summoned familiar with a measure of your eldritch power, granting the creature the following benefits:

items: The familiar gains either a flying speed or a swimming speed (your choice) of 40 feet.
As a bonus action, you can command the familiar to take the {@action Attack} action.
The familiar's weapon attacks are considered magical for the purpose of overcoming immunity and resistance to nonmagical attacks.
If the familiar forces a creature to make a saving throw, it uses your spell save DC.
When the familiar takes damage, you can use your reaction to grant it resistance against that damage.

optionalfeature.name: Investment of the Chain Master
entries: When you cast find familiar, you infuse the summoned familiar with a measure of your eldritch power, granting the creature the following benefits:

items: The familiar gains either a flying speed or a swimming speed (your choice) of 40 feet.
The familiar no longer needs to breathe.
The familiar's weapon attacks are considered magical for the purpose of overcoming immunity and resistance to nonmagical attacks.
If the familiar forces a creature to make a saving throw, it uses your spell save DC.

optionalfeature.name: Ise (Frost Rune)
entries: This rune's magic evokes a frost giant's stoic calm. While wearing or carrying an object inscribed with this rune, you have advantage on Wisdom ({@skill Animal Handling}) checks and Charisma ({@skill Intimidation}) checks.

In addition, you can invoke the rune as a bonus action to increase your Strength score by 2 for 10 minutes. This increase can cause your score to exceed 20, but not 30. Once you invoke the rune, you can't do so again until you finish a short or long rest.

optionalfeature.name: Kiss of Mephistopheles
entries: When you hit a creature with your {@spell 魔能爆}, you can cast fireball as a bonus action using a warlock spell slot. The spell must be centered on the creature you hit with {@spell 魔能爆}.

optionalfeature.name: Kiss of Mephistopheles
entries: You can channel the fires of Mephistopheles through your {@spell 魔能爆}. When you hit a creature with that cantrip, you can cast {@spell 火球術} as a bonus action using a warlock spell slot. However, the spell must be centered on a creature you hit with eldritch blast.

optionalfeature.name: 怠惰之槍
entries: 在你的每個回合一次，當你使用你的{@spell 魔能爆}命中一個生物時，你可以讓該生物的移動速度降低10呎，持續直到你的下個回合結束。

optionalfeature.name: 飲命者
entries: 當你使用你的契約武器命中一個生物時，該生物受到等同你魅力調整值的額外死靈傷害（最少為1）。

optionalfeature.name: 突刺擊
entries: 當你在你的回合進行一次近戰武器攻擊時，你可以消耗一顆卓越骰以使你該攻擊的觸及範圍增加5呎。若你命中，則你將卓越骰加入該攻擊的傷害骰中。

optionalfeature.name: Mace of Dispater
entries: When you create your pact weapon as a mace, it manifests as an iron mace forged in Dis, the second of the Nine Hells. When you hit a creature with it, you can expend a spell slot to deal an additional {@damage 2d8} force damage to the target per spell level, and you can knock the target {@condition prone} if it is Huge or smaller.

optionalfeature.name: 癲狂巫咒
entries: 以一個附贈動作，你讓被你使用{@spell 脆弱詛咒}法術或你的契術師能力（像是咒劍詛咒或兇兆符記）所詛咒的目標環繞著一道精神亂流。當你這麼做時，你對該目標和每個距離它5呎內你所選擇的生物造成精神傷害。這個精神傷害等同於你的魅力調整值（最少為0點傷害）。

optionalfeature.name: 癲狂巫咒
entries: 以一個附贈動作，你讓被你使用{@spell 脆弱詛咒}法術或你的契術師能力（像是咒劍詛咒或兇兆符記）所詛咒的目標環繞著一道精神亂流。當你這麼做時，你對被詛咒的目標和每個距離它5呎內你所選且你能看見的生物造成精神傷害。這個精神傷害等同於你的魅力調整值（最少為1點傷害）。若要使用此祈喚，你必須要能夠看見被詛咒的目標，且它必須距離你30呎內。

optionalfeature.name: 靈動擊
entries: 當你以一次武器攻擊命中一個生物時，你可以消耗一顆卓越骰以調動你其中一個夥伴到一處更有利的位置。你將卓越骰加入該攻擊的傷害骰中，且你選擇一個能夠看見或聽見你的友善生物。該生物可以使用它的反應以移動最多等同於它移動速度一半的距離，且不會觸發來自你攻擊目標的藉機攻擊。

optionalfeature.name: 多口囊袋
entries: 這些灌入註法的囊袋全都共用一個容量等同於一個囊袋的異次元空間。因此，將手伸進其中任何一個囊袋都會進入相同的儲存空間。一個囊袋只要和另一個囊袋彼此距離在100哩內就能夠正常運作，否則該囊袋將會變的空空如也，且無法放入任何物體。
若這個註法被終止，則被儲存於共用空間的物體將會隨機移動到其中一個囊袋。其餘的囊袋將變得空空如也。

optionalfeature.name: 水手
entries: 只要你未穿戴重甲或使用盾牌，你就擁有等同於你正常移動速度的游泳速度和攀爬速度，且你的AC獲得+1加值。

optionalfeature.name: 千面之臉
entries: 你可以隨意施放{@spell 易容術}，無需消耗法術位。

optionalfeature.name: 萬形之主
entries: 你可以隨意施放{@spell 變造自身}，無需消耗法術位。

optionalfeature.name: 恐嚇擊
entries: 當你以一次武器攻擊命中一個生物時，你可以消耗一顆卓越骰以嘗試嚇唬目標。你將卓越骰加入該攻擊的傷害骰中，且目標必須進行一次睿知豁免。若豁免失敗，它將因你陷入{@condition 恐懼}直到你的下個回合結束。

optionalfeature.name: Mind Sharpener

item: A suit of armor or robes

entries: The infused item can send a jolt to the wearer to refocus their mind. The item has 4 charges. When the wearer fails a Constitution saving throw to maintain concentration on a spell, the wearer can use its reaction to expend 1 of the item's charges to succeed instead. The item regains {@dice 1d4} expended charges daily at dawn.

optionalfeature.name: Mind Sharpener

item: A suit of armor or robes

entries: The infused item can send a jolt to the wearer to refocus their mind. While wearing this infused item, whenever the creature fails a Constitution saving throw to maintain concentration on a spell, it can use its reaction to succeed instead.

optionalfeature.name: Mind-Scrambling Arrow
entries: Your enchantment magic causes this arrow to temporarily beguile its target. Choose one of your allies within 30 feet of the target. If the arrow hits a creature, the target takes an extra {@damage 2d6} psychic damage, and it must succeed on a Wisdom saving throw or it can't attack the chosen ally or include that ally in a harmful area of effect until the start of your next turn. This effect ends early if the chosen ally deals any damage to the target.
The psychic damage increases to {@damage 4d6} when you reach 18th level in this class.

optionalfeature.name: 渾沌僕役
entries: 你可以使用契術師法術位施放一次{@spell 召喚元素生物}。直到你完成一次長休之前你都不能再這麼做。

optionalfeature.name: 陷困心靈
entries: 你可以使用契術師法術位施放一次{@spell 緩速術}。直到你完成一次長休之前你都不能再這麼做。

optionalfeature.name: 雲霧式
entries: 你可以消耗4點氣以施放{@spell 氣化形體}，以你自己為目標。

optionalfeature.name: 迷霧幻影
entries: 你可以隨意施放{@spell 無聲幻影}，無需消耗法術位或材料構材。

optionalfeature.name: Moon Bow
entries: You can create a longbow using your Pact of the Blade feature. When you draw back its string and fire, it creates an arrow of white wood, which vanishes after 1 minute. You have advantage on attack rolls against lycanthropes with the bow. When you hit a creature with it, you can expend a spell slot to deal an additional {@damage 2d8} radiant damage to the target per spell level.

optionalfeature.name: Nullification
entries: If the named target is affected by any other spells, you know what those spells are, and you can attempt to end one of your choice by succeeding on an Intelligence check with a DC equal to 10 + the level of the chosen spell.

optionalfeature.name: 融身入影
entries: 當你處於微光光照或黑暗區域時，你可以使用你的動作以變得{@condition 隱形}，直到你移動或採取動作或反應。

optionalfeature.name: 超凡跳躍
entries: 你可以對你自己隨意施放{@spell 跳躍術}，無需消耗法術位或材料構材。

optionalfeature.name: 鋒刃魔契
entries: 你可以使用你的動作以在你的一隻空著的手中創造一把契約武器。你可以在每次創造它時選擇這把近戰武器的型態（參見第五章的武器選項）。你在使用它時熟練於該武器。這把武器在克服對非魔法攻擊和傷害的抗性和免疫時視作魔法武器。
你的契約武器會在距離你超過5呎外的情況下長達1分鐘或更久時消失。這把武器也會在你再次使用這個能力創造武器、你解消武器（無需花費動作）、或你死亡時消失。

你可以在持握一把魔法武器時藉由施展一種特別儀式以將該武器轉化成你的契約武器。施展這個儀式的過程需要1小時，且可以在短休期間被施展。你可以解消這把武器，將它存放在一個異次元空間，且它將在往後每次你創造你的契約武器時出現。你不能用這個方式影響一件神器或一把智能武器。若你死亡、你對另一把武器施展了1小時儀式、或你施展一個1小時儀式以打破跟這把武器的連結時，它將不再做為你的契約武器。若這把武器在連結中斷時處於異次元空間，則它將出現在你的腳邊。

optionalfeature.name: 鎖鏈魔契
entries: 你習得{@spell 尋獲魔寵}法術，並可以將之做為儀式施放。此法術不會計入你的已知法術數量中。
當你施放此法術時，你可以為你的魔寵選擇一個正常的型態，或選擇下列其中一個特殊的型態：{@creature 小魔鬼}、{@creature 偽龍}、{@creature 誇塞魔}、或{@creature 小妖精}。
此外，當你採取{@action 攻擊}動作時，你可以放棄你其中一次攻擊以讓你的魔寵使用它的反應進行一次攻擊。

optionalfeature.name: 星鏈魔契
entries: 在3級時，一個獻身於{@class Warlock|phb|Seeker|the Seeker (UA)|UATheFaithful}的角色可以選擇這個選項，而非契術師既存的契約恩賜選項。
The Seeker賦予你一條由星光打造的鎖鏈，飾以七顆閃爍的光輝塵埃。當這條鎖鏈在你身上時，你知曉{@spell 卜筮}法術，並可以將之做為儀式施放。此法術不會計入你的已知法術數量中。
此外，你可以在你攜帶這個物品時引發the Seeker的力量以在一次智力檢定中獲得優勢。一旦你使用這個能力，直到完成一次短休或長休之前，你都不能再使用它。
若你失去了你的星光鎖鏈，你可以施展一個長達1小時的儀式以從The Seeker那裏獲得一個替代品。。這個儀式可以在短休或長休期間被施展，且它將摧毀前一條鎖鏈。這條鎖鏈會在你死亡的時候在一陣閃光中消失。
這個物品的實際外型可能會根據你的宗主而有所不同。星光鎖鍊是受到灰鷹世界的神祇塞萊斯汀所啟發。

optionalfeature.name: Pact of the Talisman
entries: Your patron gives you an amulet, a talisman that can aid the wearer when the need is great. When the wearer fails an ability check, they can add a {@dice d4} to the roll, potentially turning the roll into a success. This benefit can be used a number of times equal to your proficiency bonus, and all expended uses are restored when you finish a long rest.

If you lose the talisman, you can perform a 1-hour ceremony to receive a replacement from your patron. This ceremony can be performed during a short or long rest, and it destroys the previous amulet. The talisman turns to ash when you die.

optionalfeature.name: Pact of the Talisman
entries: Your patron gives you a special amulet, a talisman that can aid you, or anyone else who wears it, when the need is great. When the wearer makes an ability check with a skill in which they lack proficiency, they can add a {@dice d4} to the roll.
If you lose the talisman, you can perform a 1-hour ceremony to receive a replacement from your patron. This ceremony can be performed during a short or long rest, and it destroys the previous amulet.
The talisman turns to ash when you die.

optionalfeature.name: 書卷魔契
entries: 你的宗主賜予你一本被稱作「影之書」的魔法書。當你獲得這個能力時，從任何職業的法術列表中選擇三個戲法。這些戲法不需要來自同一個法術列表。當這本書在你身上時，你可以隨意施放這些戲法。它們不會計入你的已知戲法數量。任何你透過此能力施放的戲法對你而言都視作契術師戲法。若你失去了你的影之書，你可以施展一個長達1小時的儀式以從你的宗主那裏獲得一個替代品。這個儀式可以在短休或長休期間被施展，且它將摧毀前一本書卷。這本書會在你死亡的時候化作灰燼。

optionalfeature.name: 格擋
entries: 當另一個生物以一次近戰攻擊傷害你時，你可以使用你的反應並消耗一顆卓越骰以減少傷害。該傷害將減少等同於你卓越骰所骰出的數字+你的敏捷調整值。

optionalfeature.name: Path of the Seeker
entries: The Seeker bids you to travel in search of knowledge, and little can prevent you from walking this path. You ignore difficult terrain, have advantage on all checks to escape a grapple, manacles, or rope bindings, and advantage on saving throws against being {@condition paralyzed}.

optionalfeature.name: Piercing Arrow
entries: You use transmutation magic to transform your arrow into an ethereal dart that passes through its targets. When you attack with this arrow, it fires forward in a line that is 1 foot wide and 30 feet long. You make a separate attack using your Arcane Arrow against each creature in that line.

optionalfeature.name: Piercing Arrow
entries: You use transmutation magic to transform your arrow into an ethereal dart that passes through its targets. You use transmutation magic to give your arrow an ethereal quality. When you use this option, you don't make an attack roll for the attack. Instead, the arrow fires forward in a line that is 1 foot wide and 30 feet long, before disappearing. The arrow passes harmlessly through objects, ignoring cover. Each creature in that line must make a Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, a target takes damage as if it were hit by the arrow, plus an extra {@damage 1d6} piercing damage. On a successful save, a target takes half as much damage.
The piercing damage increases to {@damage 2d6} when you reach 18th level in this class.

optionalfeature.name: 穿透箭
entries: 你利用變化系魔法以將乙太屬性賦予你的箭矢。當你使用此選項時，你不需要為此攻擊進行攻擊檢定。取而代之，這支箭矢將在消失前向前射出一道1呎寬、30呎長的直線。這支箭矢將無害地穿過物體、忽略掩護。每個在直線內的生物都必須進行一次敏捷豁免。若豁免失敗，該生物將受到如同被箭矢命中一樣傷害，再加上額外的{@dice 1d6}穿刺傷害。若豁免成功，則目標只受到一半的傷害。
這個穿刺傷害將在你本職業升至18級時增加至{@dice 2d6}。

optionalfeature.name: 精準擊
entries: 當你對一個生物進行一次武器攻擊檢定，你可以消耗一顆卓越骰以將它加入該檢定中。你可以在進行攻擊檢定之前或之後使用此戰技，但必須在任何攻擊的效果適用前使用。

optionalfeature.name: Precision Attack
entries: When you make a weapon attack against a creature, you can expend one superiority die, roll it, and add it to the attack roll. You can use this ability before or after rolling the {@dice d20}, but before any of the effects of the attack are applied.

optionalfeature.name: 守護
entries: 當一個你所能看見的生物攻擊一個距離你5呎內你以外的目標，你可以使用你的反應以讓該攻擊檢定承受劣勢。你必須持握一面盾牌。

optionalfeature.name: Protection of the Talisman
entries: When the wearer of your talisman fails a saving throw, they can add a {@dice d4} to the roll, potentially turning the save into a success. This benefit can be used a number of times equal to your proficiency bonus, and all expended uses are restored when you finish a long rest.

optionalfeature.name: Protection of the Talisman
entries: When the wearer of your talisman makes a saving throw in which they lack proficiency, they can add a {@dice d4} to the roll.

optionalfeature.name: Puppetry
entries: The first time the named creature takes damage from the spell, you can knock the creature {@condition prone} or move it up to 10 feet, either directly toward you or away from you.

optionalfeature.name: 推撞擊
entries: 當你以一次武器攻擊命中一個生物時，你可以消耗一顆卓越骰以嘗試驅使目標後退。你將卓越骰加入該攻擊的傷害骰中，且若目標的體型為大型或更小，則它必須進行一次力量豁免。若豁免失敗，你將目標推離你最多15呎距離。

optionalfeature.name: Quick Toss
entries: As a bonus action, you can expend one superiority die and make a ranged attack with a weapon that has the thrown property. You can draw the weapon as part of making this attack. If you hit, add the superiority die to the weapon's damage roll.

optionalfeature.name: 瞬發法術
entries: 當你施放一個施法時間為1個動作的法術時，你可以消耗2點術法點以將它在這次施法的的施法時間變為1個附贈動作。

optionalfeature.name: Radiant Weapon

item: A simple or martial weapon (requires attunement)

entries: This magic weapon grants a +1 bonus to attack and damage rolls made with it. While holding it, the wielder can take a bonus action to cause it to shed bright light in a 30-foot radius and dim light for an additional 30 feet. The wielder can extinguish the light as a bonus action.

The weapon has 4 charges. As a reaction immediately after being hit by an attack, the wielder can expend 1 charge and cause the attacker to be {@condition blinded} until the end of the attacker's next turn, unless the attacker succeeds on a Constitution saving throw against your spell save DC. The weapon regains {@dice 1d4} expended charges daily at dawn.

optionalfeature.name: 光燿武器

item: A simple or martial weapon (requires attunement)

entries: 這把魔法武器在使用它進行的攻擊檢定和傷害骰上賦予+1加值。當持握這把武器時，持用者能夠以一個附贈動作使它散發出30呎半徑的明亮光照和再延伸30呎的微光光照。持用者也能夠以一個附贈動作熄滅這個光照。
在被一次近戰攻擊命中時，持用者可以立即以一個反應使攻擊者陷入{@condition 目盲}狀態直到攻擊者的下個回合結束，除非攻擊者成功通過一次對抗你法術豁免DC的體質豁免。一旦使用，這個反應直到持用者完成一次短休或長休之前都不能再被使用。

optionalfeature.name: 鼓舞
entries: 在你的回合，你可以使用一個附贈動作並消耗一顆卓越骰以鼓舞你其中一個同伴的士氣。當你這麼做時，選擇一個能夠看見或聽見你的友善生物。該生物將獲得等同於你卓越骰所骰出的數字+你的魅力調整值的臨時生命值。

optionalfeature.name: Raven Queen's Blessing
entries: When you score a critical hit with your {@spell 魔能爆} cantrip, pick yourself or an ally you can see within 30 feet of you. The chosen creature can immediately expend a Hit Die to regain hit points equal to the roll + the creature's Constitution modifier (minimum of 1 hit point).

optionalfeature.name: Rebuke of the Talisman
entries: When the wearer of your talisman is hit by an attacker you can see within 30 feet of you, you can use your reaction to deal psychic damage to the attacker equal to your proficiency bonus and push it up to 10 feet away from the talisman's wearer.

optionalfeature.name: Rebuke of the Talisman
entries: When the wearer of your talisman is hit by an attacker you can see within 30 feet of you, you can use your reaction to deal psychic damage to the attacker equal to your Charisma modifier (minimum of 1 damage) and push it up to 10 feet away from the talisman's wearer.

optionalfeature.name: 無間巫咒
entries: 你的詛咒在你和你目標之間創造出一道暫時性的連結。以一個附贈動作，你可以用魔法傳送最多30呎距離到一處位於被你使用{@spell 脆弱詛咒}法術或你的契術師能力（像是咒劍詛咒或兇兆符記）所詛咒的目標5呎內，且你能看見的未被佔據空間。若要透過這個方式傳送，你必須要能夠看見被詛咒的目標。

optionalfeature.name: 無間巫咒
entries: 你的咒劍詛咒在你和你目標之間創造出一道暫時性的連結。以一個附贈動作，你可以用魔法傳送到一處位於被你咒劍詛咒給詛咒的目標5呎內，且你能看見的空間。若要這麼做，你必須要能夠看見被詛咒的目標且距離它30呎內。

optionalfeature.name: 無間巫咒
entries: 你的詛咒在你和你目標之間創造出一道暫時性的連結。以一個附贈動作，你可以用魔法傳送到一處位於被你使用{@spell 脆弱詛咒}法術或你的契術師能力（像是咒劍詛咒或兇兆符記）所詛咒的目標5呎內，距離你最多30呎遠，且你能看見的未被佔據空間。若要透過這個方式傳送，你必須要能夠看見被詛咒的目標。

optionalfeature.name: Repeating Shot

item: A simple or martial weapon with the ammunition property (requires attunement)

entries: This magic weapon grants a +1 bonus to attack and damage rolls made with it when it's used to make a ranged attack, and it ignores the loading property if it has it.

If you load no ammunition in the weapon, it produces its own, automatically creating one piece of magic ammunition when you make a ranged attack with it. The ammunition created by the weapon vanishes the instant after it hits or misses a target.

optionalfeature.name: Repeating Shot

item: A simple or martial weapon with the ammunition property (requires attunement)

entries: This magic weapon grants a +1 bonus to attack and damage rolls made with it when it's used to make a ranged attack, and it ignores the loading property if it has it.

The weapon requires no ammunition; it magically produces one piece of ammunition each time you make a ranged attack with it, unless you manually load it. The ammunition produced by the weapon vanishes the instant after the it hits or misses a target.

optionalfeature.name: 斥力衝擊
entries: 當你使用{@spell 魔能爆}命中一個生物時，你可以直線推動該生物遠離你最多10呎。

optionalfeature.name: Replicate Magic Item
entries: Using this infusion, you replicate a particular magic item. You can learn this infusion multiple times; each time you do so, choose a magic item that you can make with it, picking from the Replicable Items tables below. A table's title tells you the level you must be in the class to choose an item from the table. Alternatively, you can choose the magic item from among the {@filter common magic items|items|type=!potion;!scroll|rarity=common} in the game, not including potions or scrolls.

In the tables, an item's entry tells you whether the item requires attunement. See the item's description in the {@book Dungeon Master's Guide|DMG} for more information about it, including the type of object required for its making.

entries.caption: Replicable Items (14th-Level Artificer)
rows: {@item Belt of Hill Giant Strength||Belt of hill giant strength}

optionalfeature.name: 複製魔法物品
entries: 藉由使用這個註法，你能夠複製一個特定的魔法物品。你可以多次習得這個註法；每次你習得這個註法時，你從下列的可複製魔法物品表中選擇一個不同的魔法物品。若該表格的標題寫有特定等級，則你本職業必須至少升至該等級才能從該表格中選擇魔法物品。
在表格中，每個魔法物品的條目都會告訴你這件魔法物品是否需要同調。關於該魔法物品的更多信息（包括製作該物品所需的物品類型），請參閱《地下城主指南》中的物品敘述。

entries.caption: 可複製魔法物品 (奇械師12級)
可複製魔法物品 (奇械師16級)

optionalfeature.name: Repulsion Shield
entries: A creature gains a +1 bonus to Armor Class while wielding this shield.

The shield has 4 charges. While holding it, the wielder can use a reaction immediately after being hit by a melee attack to expend 1 of the shield's charges and push the attacker up to 15 feet away. The shield regains {@dice 1d4} expended charges daily at dawn.

optionalfeature.name: Repulsion Shield
entries: A creature gains a +1 bonus to Armor Class while wielding this shield. While holding it, the wielder can use a reaction immediately after being hit by a melee attack to push the attacker up to 15 feet away. Once used, this reaction can't be used again until the wielder finishes a short or long rest.

optionalfeature.name: Resistant Armor
entries: While wearing this armor, a creature has resistance to one of the following damage types, which you choose when you infuse the item: acid, cold, fire, force, lightning, necrotic, poison, psychic, radiant, or thunder.

optionalfeature.name: 抗性護甲
entries: 當穿戴此護甲時，生物將具有下列其中一個傷害屬性的抗性，由你在為這個物品註能時選擇：酸蝕、寒冰、火燄、力場、閃電、死靈、毒素、精神、光燿、或雷鳴。

optionalfeature.name: Restraining Strike
entries: Immediately after you hit a creature with a melee weapon attack on your turn, you can expend one superiority die and use a bonus action to grapple the target (see chapter 9 in the Player's Handbook for rules on grappling). Add the superiority die to your Strength ({@skill Athletics}) check. The target is also {@condition restrained} while {@condition grappled} in this way.

optionalfeature.name: Returning Weapon

item: A simple or martial weapon with the thrown property

entries: This magic weapon grants a +1 bonus to attack and damage rolls made with it, and it returns to the wielder's hand immediately after it is used to make a ranged attack.

optionalfeature.name: 迴力武器

item: A simple or martial weapon with the thrown property

entries: 這把魔法武器在使用它進行的攻擊檢定和傷害骰上賦予+1加值，且它在被用以進行一次遠程攻擊之後，將會立即返回持用者的手中。

optionalfeature.name: 攀雲步
entries: 你可以消耗4點氣以施放{@spell 飛行術}，以你自己為目標。

optionalfeature.name: 反擊
entries: 當一個生物在一次對你進行的近戰攻擊中失手，你可以使用你的反應並消耗一顆卓越骰以對該生物進行一次近戰武器攻擊。若你命中，則你將卓越骰加入該攻擊的傷害骰中。

optionalfeature.name: 噬燄流
entries: 你可以消耗5點氣以施放{@spell 火牆術}。

optionalfeature.name: 風靈突進
entries: 你可以消耗2點氣以施放{@spell 造風術}。

optionalfeature.name: 重塑血肉
entries: 你可以使用契術師法術位施放一次{@spell 變形術}。直到你完成一次長休之前你都不能再這麼做。

optionalfeature.name: Sea Twins' Gift
entries: The Sea Twins rule seas in the Feywild. Their gift allows you to travel through water with ease. You can breathe underwater, and you gain a swimming speed equal to your walking speed.
You can also cast {@spell 水下呼吸} using a warlock spell slot. Once you cast it using this invocation, you can't do so again until you finish a long rest.

optionalfeature.name: Seeker's Speech
entries: Your quest for knowledge allows you to master any spoken language. When you complete a long rest, you can pick two languages. You gain the ability to speak, read, and write the chosen languages until you finish your next long rest.

optionalfeature.name: Seeking Arrow
entries: Using divination magic, you grant your arrow the ability to seek out your target, allowing the arrow to curve and twist its path in search of its prey. As an action, choose one creature you have seen in the past minute, and make a ranged attack against it, using the Arcane Arrow. The arrow flies around corners if necessary, and this attack ignores three-quarters cover, half cover, and disadvantage caused by the target being out of sight or being at long range. The attack automatically misses if the target is out of the weapon's range or if there is no path large enough for the arrow to travel to the target. If the arrow hits its target, you know it, but you don't learn the target's location unless it's within your line of sight.

optionalfeature.name: Seeking Arrow
entries: Using divination magic, you grant your arrow the ability to seek out your target, allowing the arrow to curve and twist its path in search of its prey. When you use this option, you don't make an attack roll for the attack. Instead, choose one creature you have seen in the past minute. The arrow flies toward that creature, moving around corners if necessary and ignoring three-quarters cover and half cover. If the target is within the weapon's range and there is a path large enough for the arrow to travel to the target, the target must make a Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, it takes damage as if it were hit by the arrow, plus an extra {@damage 1d6} force damage, and you learn the target's current location. On a successful save, the target takes half as much damage, and you don't learn its location.
The force damage increases to {@damage 2d6} when you reach 18th level in this class.

optionalfeature.name: 追蹤箭
entries: 利用預言系魔法，你賦予你的箭矢追蹤目標的能力。當你使用此選項時，你不需要為此攻擊進行攻擊檢定。取而代之，選擇一個你在過去1分鐘內曾見過的生物。這支箭矢將飛向該生物，若有需要的話則繞過轉角，並忽略四分之三掩護和半掩護。若該目標在此武器的射程內，且其存在一條能讓箭矢通往目標的途徑，則目標必須進行一次敏捷豁免。否則這支箭矢將在飛至最遠距離之後消失。若豁免失敗，目標將受到如同被箭矢命中一樣傷害，再加上額外的{@dice 1d6}力場傷害，且你將得知目標當下所在的位置。若豁免成功，則目標只受到一半的傷害，且你無法得知它所在的位置。
這個力場傷害將在你本職業升至18級時增加至{@dice 2d6}。

optionalfeature.name: Seeking Spell
entries: If you make an attack roll for a spell and miss, you can spend 2 sorcery points to reroll the {@dice d20}, and you must use the new roll.
You can use Seeking Spell even if you have already used a different Metamagic option during the casting of the spell.

optionalfeature.name: Seeking Spell
entries: When you cast a spell that requires you to make a spell attack roll or that forces a target to make a Dexterity saving throw, you can spend 1 sorcery point to ignore the effects of half- and three-quarters cover against targets of the spell.

optionalfeature.name: Shadow Arrow
entries: You weave illusion magic into your arrow, causing it to occlude your foe's vision with grasping shadows. Until the end of your next turn, the target hit by the arrow can't see more than 30 feet away.

optionalfeature.name: Shadow Arrow
entries: You weave illusion magic into your arrow, causing it to occlude your foe's vision with grasping shadows. If the arrow hits a creature, the target takes an extra {@damage 2d6} psychic damage, and it must succeed on a Wisdom saving throw or be unable to see anything farther than 5 feet away until the start of your next turn.
The psychic damage increases to {@damage 4d6} when you reach 18th level in this class.

optionalfeature.name: 暗影箭
entries: 你將幻術系魔法編入你的箭矢中，使它以暗影遮蔽你敵人的視線。被此箭命中的生物將受到額外的{@dice 2d6}精神傷害，且它必須成功通過一次睿知豁免，否則直到你的下個回合開始前都無法看見任何5呎以外的事物。
這個精神傷害將在你本職業升至18級時增加至{@dice 4d6}。

optionalfeature.name: 形塑流川
entries: 以一個動作，你可以消耗1點氣以選擇一片距離你120呎內，各邊不超過30呎的冰或水的區域。你可以將該區域內的水變成冰，反之亦可，且你可以將區域內的冰重塑成任何你想要的樣子。你可以升高或降低冰的海拔高度、創造或填滿一道溝壑，升起或移平一道牆、或形成一根立柱。任何這類變化的程度都不能超過這片區域最大邊長的一半。舉例來說，若你影響了一片30呎平方的方形區域，你可以創造出一個最多15呎高的立柱、將這片方形區域的高度提升或降低最多15呎、或挖掘一道最多15呎深的溝壑，諸如此類。你無法透過形塑冰以困住或傷害位於區域內的生物。

optionalfeature.name: 暗影蔽幕
entries: 你可以隨意施放{@spell 隱形術}，無需消耗法術位。

optionalfeature.name: 暗影蔽幕
entries: 你可以隨意施放{@spell 隱形術}，無需消耗法術位。

optionalfeature.name: Shroud of Ulban
entries: The blue-white star Ulban maintains a fickle presence among the stars, fluttering into view only to herald a dire omen. As an action, you can turn {@condition invisible} for 1 minute. If you attack, deal damage, or force a creature to make a saving throw, you become visible at the end of the current turn.

optionalfeature.name: 兇兆符記
entries: 你可以使用契術師法術位施放一次{@spell 降咒}。直到你完成一次長休之前你都不能再這麼做。

optionalfeature.name: Silver Tongue
entries: When you make a Charisma ({@skill Deception}) check or a Charisma ({@skill Persuasion}) check, you can expend one superiority die, and add the superiority die to the ability check.

optionalfeature.name: Skye (Cloud Rune)
entries: This rune's magic emulates the deceptiveness of a cloud giant. While wearing or carrying an object inscribed with this rune, you have advantage on Dexterity ({@skill Sleight of Hand}) checks and Charisma ({@skill Deception}) checks.

In addition, when you or a creature you can see within 30 feet of you is hit by an attack roll, you can use your reaction to invoke the rune and cause that attack to target a different creature within 30 feet of you (other than the attacker), using the same roll. This magic can transfer the attack regardless of the attack's range. Once you invoke the rune, you can't do so again until you finish a short or long rest.

optionalfeature.name: Smoke Stick
entries: As an action, you can reach into your Alchemist's Satchel and pull out a stick that produces a thick plume of smoke. You can hold on to the stick or throw it to a point up to 30 feet away as part of the action used to produce it. The area in a 10-foot radius around the stick is filled with thick smoke that blocks vision, including {@sense darkvision}. The stick and smoke persist for 1 minute and then disappear. After using this formula, you can't do so again for 1 minute.

optionalfeature.name: Snipe
entries: As a bonus action, you can expend one superiority die and make a ranged weapon attack. You can draw a thrown weapon as part of making this attack. If you hit, add the superiority die to the attack's damage roll.

optionalfeature.name: Spell-Refueling Ring
entries: While wearing this ring, the creature can recover one expended spell slot as an action. The recovered slot can be of 3rd level or lower. Once used, the ring can't be used again until the next dawn.

optionalfeature.name: Spell-Refueling Ring
entries: While wearing this ring, the creature can recover one expended spell slot as an action. The maximum level of the recovered slot is equal to the number of magic items the wearer is currently attuned to. Once used, the ring can't be used again until the next dawn.

optionalfeature.name: Stein (Stone Rune)
entries: This rune's magic channels the insightfulness of a stone giant. While wearing or carrying an object inscribed with this rune, you have advantage on Wisdom ({@skill Insight}) checks, and you have {@sense darkvision} out to a range of 60 feet. If you already have {@sense darkvision}, its range increases by 30 feet.

In addition, when a creature you can see ends its turn within 30 feet of you, you can use your reaction to invoke the rune and force the creature to make a Wisdom saving throw. Unless the save succeeds, the creature is {@condition charmed} by you for 1 minute. While {@condition charmed} in this way, the creature has a speed of 0 and is {@condition incapacitated}, descending into a dreamy stupor. The effect ends if the {@condition charmed} creature takes any damage or if someone else uses an action to shake the creature out of its haze. Once you invoke the rune, you can't do so again until you finish a short or long rest.

optionalfeature.name: Stone Rune
entries: This rune's magic channels the judiciousness associated with stone giants. While wearing or carrying an object inscribed with this rune, you have advantage on Wisdom ({@skill Insight}) checks, and you have {@sense darkvision} out to a range of 120 feet.

In addition, when a creature you can see ends its turn within 30 feet of you, you can use your reaction to invoke the rune and force the creature to make a Wisdom saving throw. Unless the save succeeds, the creature is {@condition charmed} by you for 1 minute. While {@condition charmed} in this way, the creature has a speed of 0 and is {@condition incapacitated}, descending into a dreamy stupor. The creature repeats the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on a success. Once you invoke this rune, you can't do so again until you finish a short or long rest.

optionalfeature.name: Storm Rune
entries: Using this rune, you can glimpse the future like a storm giant seer. While wearing or carrying an object inscribed with this rune, you have advantage on Intelligence ({@skill Arcana}) checks, and you can't be surprised as long as you aren't {@condition incapacitated}.

In addition, you can invoke the rune as a bonus action to enter a prophetic state for 1 minute or until you're {@condition incapacitated}. Until the state ends, when you or another creature you can see within 60 feet of you makes an attack roll, a saving throw, or an ability check, you can use your reaction to cause the roll to have advantage or disadvantage. Once you invoke this rune, you can't do so again until you finish a short or long rest.

optionalfeature.name: Studious Eye
entries: When you make a Wisdom ({@skill Insight}) check or an Intelligence ({@skill Investigation}) check, you can expend one superiority die, and add the superiority die to the ability check.

optionalfeature.name: 精妙法術
entries: 當你施放一個法術時，你可以消耗1點術法點以施放它而無須提供任何姿勢或聲音構材。

optionalfeature.name: Superior Pact Weapon
entries: Any weapon you create using your Pact of the Blade feature is a +2 weapon. This invocation doesn't affect a magic weapon you transformed into your pact weapon.

optionalfeature.name: Superior Technique
entries: You learn one {@filter maneuver|optionalfeatures|feature type=MV:B} of your choice from among those available to the {@class fighter|phb|Battle Master|Battle Master|phb|2-0} archetype. If a maneuver you use requires your target to make a saving throw to resist the maneuver's effects, the saving throw DC equals 8 + your proficiency bonus + your Strength or Dexterity modifier (your choice).

You gain one superiority die, which is a {@dice d6} (this die is added to any superiority dice you have from another source). This die is used to fuel your maneuvers. A superiority die is expended when you use it. You regain your expended superiority dice when you finish a short or long rest.

optionalfeature.name: Superior Technique
entries: You learn one {@filter maneuver|optionalfeatures|feature type=MV;MV:B} of your choice from among those available to the Battle Master archetype. If a maneuver you use requires your target to make a saving throw to resist the maneuver's effects, the saving throw DC equals 8 + your proficiency bonus + your Strength or Dexterity modifier (your choice).

You gain one superiority die, which is a {@dice d6} (this die is added to any superiority dice you have from another source). This die is used to fuel your maneuvers. A superiority die is expended when you use it. You regain your expended superiority dice when you finish a short or long rest.

optionalfeature.name: 橫掃擊
entries: 當你以一次近戰武器攻擊命中一個生物時，你可以消耗一顆卓越骰以嘗試以相同的攻擊傷害另一個生物。選擇另一個距離原本目標5呎內，且處於你觸及範圍的生物。若原本的攻擊檢定能夠命中第二個生物，則它將受到等同於你卓越骰所骰出的數字的傷害。這個傷害的傷害類型與原本攻擊所造成的傷害類型相同。

optionalfeature.name: 飛炎擊
entries: 你可以消耗2點氣以施放{@spell 燃燒之手}。

optionalfeature.name: Swift Step Draught
entries: As a bonus action, you can reach into your Alchemist's Satchel and pull out a vial filled with a bubbling, brown liquid. As an action, a creature can drink it. Doing so increases the creature's speed by 20 feet for 1 minute, and the vial disappears. If not used, the vial and its contents disappear after 1 minute. After using this formula, you can't do so again for 1 minute.

optionalfeature.name: Sympathy
entries: If the named creature is within range of the spell, you can target the creature with the spell even if you can't see the creature or it has total cover against the spell.

optionalfeature.name: Tactical Assessment
entries: When you make an Intelligence ({@skill Investigation}), an Intelligence ({@skill History}), or a Wisdom ({@skill Insight}) check, you can expend one superiority die and add the superiority die to the ability check.

optionalfeature.name: Tanglefoot
entries: As an action, you can reach into your Alchemist's Satchel and pull out a bag filled with writhing, sticky black tar and hurl it at a point on the ground within 30 feet of you (the bag and its contents disappear if you don't hurl the bag by the end of the current turn). The bag bursts on impact and covers the ground in a 5-foot radius with sticky goo. That area becomes difficult terrain for 1 minute, and any creature that starts its turn on the ground in that area has its speed halved for that turn. After using this formula, you can't do so again for 1 minute.

optionalfeature.name: 五運竊賊
entries: 你可以使用契術師法術位施放一次{@spell 災禍術}。直到你完成一次長休之前你都不能再這麼做。

optionalfeature.name: 飢渴鋒刃
entries: 每當你在你的回合採取攻擊動作時，你可以使用你的契約武器攻擊二次，而非一次。

optionalfeature.name: Thrown Weapon Fighting
entries: You can draw a weapon that has the thrown property as part of the attack you make with the weapon.
In addition, when you hit with a ranged attack using a thrown weapon, you gain a +2 bonus to the damage roll.

optionalfeature.name: Thrown Weapon Fighting
entries: You can draw a weapon that has the thrown property as part of the attack you make with the weapon.
In addition, when you hit with a ranged attack using a thrown weapon, you gain a +1 bonus to the damage roll.

optionalfeature.name: Thunderstone
entries: As an action, you can reach into your Alchemist's Satchel and pull out a crystalline shard and hurl it at a creature, object, or surface within 30 feet of you (the shard disappears if you don't hurl it by the end of the current turn). The shard shatters on impact with a blast of concussive energy. Each creature within 10 feet of the point of impact must succeed on a Constitution saving throw or be knocked {@condition prone} and pushed 10 feet away from that point.

optionalfeature.name: 萊維斯圖斯之墓
entries: 當你受到傷害時，你可以採取一個反應以將自己封入冰墓中，這塊冰墓將在你的下個回合結束時溶化消失。你獲得每契術師等級10點的臨時生命值，且用其盡可能地承受觸發它的傷害。緊接在你承受傷害之後，你獲得對火燄傷害的易傷，你的移動速度歸零，且你陷入{@condition 無力}狀態。這些效果都將在冰墓溶解時消失。
一旦你使用此祈喚，直到你完成一次短休或長休之前都無法再使用它。

optionalfeature.name: 萊維斯圖斯之墓
entries: 當你受到傷害時，你可以採取一個反應以將自己封入冰墓中，這塊冰墓將在你的下個回合結束時溶化消失。你獲得每契術師等級10點的臨時生命值，且用其盡可能地承受觸發它的傷害。緊接在你承受傷害之後，你獲得對火燄傷害的易傷，你的移動速度歸零，且你陷入{@condition 無力}狀態。所有這些效果都將在冰墓溶解時消失。
一旦你使用此祈喚，直到你完成一次短休或長休之前都無法再使用它。

optionalfeature.name: 萊維斯圖斯之墓
entries: 當你受到傷害時，你可以採取一個反應以將自己封入冰墓中，這塊冰墓將在你的下個回合結束時溶化消失。你獲得每契術師等級10點的臨時生命值，且用其盡可能地承受觸發它的傷害。緊接在你承受傷害之後，你獲得對火燄傷害的易傷，你的移動速度歸零，且你陷入{@condition 無力}狀態。這些效果，包括剩餘的臨時生命值，都將在冰墓溶解時消失。
一旦你使用此祈喚，直到你完成一次短休或長休之前都無法再使用它。

optionalfeature.name: Transmuted Spell
entries: When you cast a spell that deals a type of damage from the following list, you can spend 1 sorcery point to change that damage type to one of the other listed types: acid, cold, fire, lightning, poison, thunder.

optionalfeature.name: 詭術逃脫
entries: 你可以對你自己施放一次{@spell 行動自如術}而無需消耗法術位。你在完成一次長休後恢復這麼做的能力。

optionalfeature.name: 詭術逃脫
entries: 你可以對你自己施放一次{@spell 行動自如術}而無需消耗法術位。你在完成一次長休後恢復這麼做的能力。

optionalfeature.name: 絆摔擊
entries: 當你以一次武器攻擊命中一個生物時，你可以消耗一顆卓越骰以嘗試將目標擊倒。你將卓越骰加入該攻擊的傷害骰中，且若目標的體型為大型或更小，則它必須進行一次力量豁免。若豁免失敗，則你將目標擊倒{@condition 伏地}。

optionalfeature.name: Trip Attack
entries: When you hit a creature with a weapon attack, you can expend one superiority die to attempt to knock the target down. Roll the die, and add it to the attack's damage roll. If the target is Large or smaller, it must also succeed on a Strength saving throw (DC 8 + your proficiency bonus + your Strength modifier) or be knocked {@condition prone}.

optionalfeature.name: 坑道鬥士
entries: 以一個附贈動作，你可以進入防禦架式並持續直到你的下個回合開始。當你處於防禦架式時，你可以進行藉機攻擊而無需使用你的反應，且你可以處於你觸及範圍內的生物移動超過5呎時使用你的反應對它進行一次近戰攻擊。

optionalfeature.name: 孿生法術
entries: 當你施放一個射程不為自身，且在使用當前法術位時無法指定超過一個生物作為目標的法術時，你可以消耗等同於該法術環階數量的術法點以使用同個法術指定射程內的第二個生物做為目標（若該法術為戲法，則消耗1點術法點）。
要符合條件，該法術必須要在使用當前法術位時無法指定超過一個生物作為目標。舉例來說，{@spell 魔法飛彈}和{@spell 灼熱射線}並不符合條件，但{@spell 冷凍射線}和{@spell 幻色法球}則可。

optionalfeature.name: 雙武器戰鬥
entries: 當你進行雙武器戰鬥時，你可以將你的屬性調整值加入第二次攻擊的傷害中。

optionalfeature.name: Ultimate Pact Weapon
entries: Any weapon you create using your Pact of the Blade feature is a +3 weapon. This invocation doesn't affect a magic weapon you transformed into your pact weapon.

optionalfeature.name: Unarmed Fighting
entries: Your unarmed strikes can deal bludgeoning damage equal to {@damage 1d6} + your Strength modifier on a hit. If you aren't wielding any weapons or a {@item shield|phb} when you make the attack roll, the {@damage d6} becomes a {@damage d8}.
At the start of each of your turns, you can deal {@damage 1d4} bludgeoning damage to one creature {@condition grappled} by you.

optionalfeature.name: Unarmed Fighting
entries: Your unarmed strikes can deal bludgeoning damage equal to {@damage 1d6} + your Strength modifier. If you strike with two free hands, the {@damage d6} becomes a {@damage d8}.

When you successfully start a grapple, you can deal {@damage 1d4} bludgeoning damage to the {@condition grappled} creature. Until the grapple ends, you can also deal this damage to the creature whenever you hit it with a melee attack.

optionalfeature.name: Unbroken Air
entries: You can create a blast of compressed air that strikes like a mighty fist. As an action, you can spend 2 ki points and choose a creature within 30 feet of you. That creature must make a Strength saving throw. On a failed save, the creature takes {@damage 3d10} bludgeoning damage, plus an extra {@damage 1d10} bludgeoning damage for each additional ki point you spend, and you can push the creature up to 20 feet away from you and knock it {@condition prone}. On a successful save, the creature takes half as much damage, and you don't push it or knock it {@condition prone}.

optionalfeature.name: Undying Servitude
entries: You can cast {@spell 活化死屍} without using a spell slot. Once you do so, you can't cast it in this way again until you finish a long rest.

optionalfeature.name: Unerring Spell
entries: If you make an attack roll for a spell and miss, you can spend 2 sorcery points to reroll the attack roll. You must use the result of the second roll.
You can use Unerring Spell even if you have already used a different Metamagic option during the casting of the spell.

optionalfeature.name: Uvar (Storm Rune)
entries: Using this rune, you can glimpse the future like a storm giant. While wearing or carrying an object inscribed with this rune, you have advantage on Intelligence ({@skill Arcana}) checks, and you can't be surprised as long as you are not {@condition incapacitated}.

In addition, you can invoke the rune as a bonus action to enter a prophetic state for 1 minute or until you're {@condition incapacitated}. Until the state ends, when you or another creature you can see within 60 feet of you makes an attack roll, a saving throw, or an ability check, you can use your reaction to cause the roll to have advantage or disadvantage. Once you invoke the rune, you can't do so again until you finish a short or long rest.

optionalfeature.name: 穹宇盡視
entries: 你可以隨意施放{@spell 祕法眼}，無需消耗法術位。

optionalfeature.name: 縛主之音
entries: 只要你和你的魔寵處於相同的存在位面，你就可以藉由心靈感應和它溝通，且可以透過你魔寵的感官感知周遭。此外，當透過你魔寵的感官感知時，你也可以透過你的魔寵用你自己的聲音說話，即使你的魔寵原本沒有辦法說話也一樣。

optionalfeature.name: Warding Maneuver
entries: If you or a creature within 5 feet of you is hit by an attack, you can expend one superiority die as a reaction if you're wielding a weapon or a shield. Roll the die, and add the number rolled to the target's AC against that attack. If the attack still hits, the target has resistance against the attack's damage.

optionalfeature.name: 清流鞭
entries: 你可以消耗2點氣，並以一個動作創造出一條流水長鞭推拉目標使其失衡。一個距離你30呎內且你所能看見的生物必須進行一次敏捷豁免。若豁免失敗，該生物將受到{@dice 3d10}鈍擊傷害，加上你每額外消耗一點氣的額外{@dice 1d10}鈍擊傷害，且你可以將它擊倒{@condition 伏地}或將它向你拉近最多25呎距離。若豁免成功，該生物只受到一半的傷害，且你無法拉動它或將它擊倒{@condition 伏地}。

optionalfeature.name: 滾石浪
entries: 你可以消耗6點氣以施放{@spell 石牆術}。

optionalfeature.name: 墳墓低語
entries: 你可以隨意施放{@spell 死者交談術}，無需消耗法術位。

optionalfeature.name: 巫者視界
entries: 當任何變形者或被幻術系或變化系法術隱藏的生物距離你30呎內並處於你視線範圍內，你可以看見該生物的真實型態。
